hello this is chef john from food wishes
comm with seared halibut with hot bacon

roma beans not blanched you can do this

slice those up set it aside I'm gonna
put my bacon in a cold saute pan turn it
on medium and start cooking it now what
I want to gauge here I want the bacon to
go about halfway because I want to add
my beans and cook them in the bacon fat
and if I cook my bacon too far it's
going to get overdone
by the time the beans are cooked so I
cook this well you'll see it kind of
looks like that
so they're cooked but they're not really

especially since they're so small you're

right in there's our two beautiful

so get some halibut get a few roma beans
